title: Swung Too Hard
description: Without the resistance of a successful strike, you lose hold of your weapon. Spend 5 Stamina to either recover it or draw a different weapon.

title: Slipped
description: You step on something slippery. Test DEX or be Knocked Down.

title: Moved Wrong
description: You overdo it and pull a muscle. Test CON or reduce your Stamina by 3 for this encounter.

title: Lost Confidence
description: Now that you think about it, this is not looking good. Reduce your Initiative by 2.

title: Panic Attack
description: Test WIL or reduce your Combat skills by 2 for this encounter.

title: Twisted Ankle
description: You step the wrong way and now it hurts each time you move. Add +2 to all incoming damage.

title: Exposed
description: You swing ungraciously and leave yourself exposed. All enemies targeting you get a free attack.

title: Unguarded
description: You are fighting recklessly. You cannot spend Stamina on defensive maneuvers for the rest of this encounter.

title: Exhausted
description: The fight's weight suddenly overwhelms you. Roll Recovery Checks with disadvantage for this encounter.

title: Terrible Swing
description: You miscalculate badly, not only missing your target but hitting yourself. Roll for damage as normal.
